mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, title, type, status, organization
mapper.insert: insert into KQDS_INFORMATION (SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, title, type, status, organization, content) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB})

mapper.update:
update KQDS_INFORMATION
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_INFORMATION set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_INFORMATION set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select p.seq_id, dict.dict_name as type, p.title from
p LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT dict on p.type = dict.seq_id where 1=1
and p.${key} = #{val}
order by p.createtime desc

select dict.dict_name as typename, p.SEQ_ID, p.createuser, p.createtime, p.title, p.type, p.status, p.organization ,p.content from
p LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT dict on p.type = dict.seq_id where 1=1
and ( dict.dict_name like '%'+#{searchinput}+'%' or p.title like '%'+#{searchinput}+'%' or p.content like '%'+#{searchinput}+'%')
and p.organization = #{organization} ORDER BY p.createtime
